## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6420195641453da05a99cb9cc2b76489f85ae69538d06f8a4a63180e40b4d1a5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'int_affirm_controllers' @ 99.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
